description: This file defines an Android DialogFragment for creating and editing user reviews, including UI setup, data binding, validation, and interaction with the RatingsRepository.

classes.name: ReviewEditorDialogFragment
classes.description: A DialogFragment for adding or editing a user review, managing UI elements, validation, and interactions with the ratings data repository.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment with arguments specifying the mode and target review.

methods.name: onCreateDialog
methods.description: Creates and configures the review editor dialog, including pre-filling data if editing, and handling validation and submission.

methods.name: newAdd
methods.description: Factory method to create a new instance of the fragment for adding a review.

methods.name: newEdit
methods.description: Factory method to create a new instance of the fragment for editing an existing review.

methods.name: updateRatingLabel
methods.description: Updates the displayed rating value and content description based on the slider position.
